questions.question: A company is conducting multiple machine learning experiments using Amazon SageMaker. The team is focused on automating its ML workflows to include data preprocessing, training, hyperparameter tuning, and model deployment. They need to track every step and ensure reproducibility of their models while reducing manual intervention. Which combination of SageMaker features should they use?
options: SageMaker Experiments, SageMaker Neo, and SageMaker Feature Store
SageMaker Autopilot, SageMaker Experiments, and SageMaker Pipelines
SageMaker Studio, SageMaker Clarify, and SageMaker Experiments
SageMaker Experiments, SageMaker Pipelines, and SageMaker Model Monitor
correct_answers: SageMaker Autopilot, SageMaker Experiments, and SageMaker Pipelines
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
